previewArticle.title: USMNT vs. Mexico | International Friendly Match Preview

recapArticle.title: USMNT 2, Mexico 2 | International Friendly Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Carlos Peña (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Michael Bradley (USA).

timelineItems.name: Bryan Brown
timelineItems.text: Luckily I have no class tomorrow so I can stay up and watch this whole game! #USAvMEX ⚽️��

timelineItems.name: Tamara Braunstein
timelineItems.text: Mexico hasn't scored against the US in 343+ minutes! #GoUSA #USAvMex #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Eduardinho
timelineItems.text: Are we really getting ole's nine minutes into the first half? This is why we hate you, Mexico. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Nick Barnowski
timelineItems.text: If these #USMNT kits used the same shade of blue that's in the actual flag, they'd be perfect.

timelineItems.name: Mr300FreedomsPerHour
timelineItems.text: We look sooo much better as a 4-4-2 #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Christian Rash
timelineItems.text: Dempsey and Bradley. I love that midfield. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Byron the Stampede
timelineItems.text: We are actually a pretty solid passing team #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Brad Davis (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jesús Zavala (Mexico).
Foul by Rafael Márquez (Mexico).
Chris Wondolowski (USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Chad Harris
timelineItems.text: Nice, one-touch possession play from #USMNT. Michael Bradley in the midfield is such a game changer for the US.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Omar González (USA) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Brad Davis with a cross.
Corner,  USA. Conceded by Moisés Muñoz.

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Watch Beckerman and Bradley operate in central midfield. Pass accurately, move immediately into a useful spot to retain possession. #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Dan Ahern
timelineItems.text: #USMNT fairly sharp. Good movement and tempo. Let's see if they can add creativity.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Mexico. Isaac Brizuela tries a through ball, but Alan Pulido is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (15') | MICHAEL BRADLEY abre el marcador en el área chica tras un córner cobrado por Graham Zusi. #USAvMEX 1-0

timelineItems.name: DSBN
timelineItems.text: Captain America!!! Bradley puts the #USMNT up 1-0

timelineItems.name: Fitzsimmons, Adam
timelineItems.text: Beautiful. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Jorge Ibarra
timelineItems.text: Damn, this "C" team of MEXICO be slacking #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Michael Bradley (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Francisco Javier Rodríguez (Mexico).

timelineItems.name: Cobi Montgomery ΚΣ
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOOOOOAL!!!! USA #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Matthew Zimmerman
timelineItems.text: Michael Bradley. Excellent opportunist, as always. Wish jersey's popsicle design went all the way around. No need for red back. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Underway. Let's do this. #USAvMEX: http://t.co/FDJVHMDD2k

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Isaac Brizuela (Mexico) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Alan Pulido.

timelineItems.name: Matt Bolton
timelineItems.text: Zusi a hero to Mexico #USAvMEX #USMNT #tequila

timelineItems.name: Campbell H.P
timelineItems.text: RT “@andrew_wiebe: "De nada Mexico" #USAvMEX http://t.co/ykNu3rsUE5” #SanZusi #TheClasico

timelineItems.name: Campbell H.P
timelineItems.text: RT “@andrew_wiebe: "De nada Mexico" #USAvMEX http://t.co/ykNu3rsUE5” #SanZusi #TheClasico

timelineItems.comment: Rogelio Chávez (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Michael Parkhurst (USA).
Attempt blocked. Clint Dempsey (USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Graham Zusi.
Match ends, USA 2, Mexico 2.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: [GIF] Michael Bradley gives the #USMNT a 1-0 lead: http://t.co/YIloA8nUMb #USAvMEX http://t.co/G8h4FrGaoB

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: [GIF] Michael Bradley gives the #USMNT a 1-0 lead: http://t.co/YIloA8nUMb #USAvMEX http://t.co/G8h4FrGaoB

timelineItems.name: Annabel Stephan
timelineItems.text: It's crazy how much better this team looks than they did vs. Ukraine. Michael Bradley is a gamechanger. #USMNT #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Steve Shuler
timelineItems.text: Wow. We look downright dangerous on the attack. #USMNT #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: marcel emerson
timelineItems.text: Zusi is by far man-of-the-match for these first 20mins #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Miguel Layún (Mexico) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Jesús Zavala.

timelineItems.name: Chris Stephens
timelineItems.text: A really sharp performance so far for the #USMNT. It's been a minute

timelineItems.name: Dominic Monaghan
timelineItems.text: USA are gonna tire at this pace. This game is gonna get stretched. Mexico might be playing the stamina game #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Matt Joss
timelineItems.text: You can tell the guys on both sides are putting it all out there to try and secure a spot on a WC roster, lotta fun to watch #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: #USMNT in complete control of the midfield right now. Their movement and passing has been top notch. Mexico relying on the counter. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Ethan King
timelineItems.text: I'm impressed. #USMNT looking aggressive and determined.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Miguel Layún (Mexico).
Graham Zusi (USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Randall J.
timelineItems.text: "@AlexiLalas: The #USMNT looks to be dangerous on set pieces. Revolutionary. #USAvMEX"

timelineItems.name: Christopher Rivas
timelineItems.text: Usually #Mexico has possession and the #USMNT is sneaky and gritty when scoring goals. But not in this game US with possession #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Isaac Brizuela (Mexico).
Michael Parkhurst (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Jon Scott
timelineItems.text: The sentence "US can't get away with that against the likes of Cristiano Ronaldo" is absolutely terrifying #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Greg Smith
timelineItems.text: Beckerman plays his role and does his job. Jones freelances and detracts from Bradley's ability as a result. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Charlie Phillips
timelineItems.text: Defense is narrow and we're vulnerable at right back. Shocking. #USMNT #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Joe Miller
timelineItems.text: That was beautiful #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (28') | CHRIS WONDOLOWSKI. Tony Beltrán centra la pelota, la cabecea Bradley y Wondo la empuja al fondo. #USAvMEX 2-0

timelineItems.name: ¿Brian Ordonez?
timelineItems.text: WONDO THE WONDERMAN!!!!! Goal! #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Frank Pavs
timelineItems.text: The rivalry picks up right were it left off. Big game to see who'll make it to the Brazil roster. USA! #BeatMexico #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Mike.
timelineItems.text: There are no better dreadlocks than Kyle Beckerman´s. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: IPA Podcast
timelineItems.text: Wondo and Bradley catching #ElTri backline out of position, on a fast break. Easiest #DOSACERO ever. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Alan Pulido (Mexico) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matt Besler (USA).

timelineItems.name: Fernando Bustamante
timelineItems.text: Feeling that the #USMNT are running a bit too much. Lots of game left

timelineItems.name: Zach Lenhart
timelineItems.text: Dos a Cero came quicker than expected. I'm cool with it. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Marco Fabián (Mexico) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Tony Beltran (USA).

timelineItems.name: Eric Thompson
timelineItems.text: BREAKING: Michael Bradley to replace Chris Evans in new Captain America film. #USMNT #DosACero #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Rogelio Chávez (Mexico).
Clint Dempsey (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: ✨
timelineItems.text: First half & second half #DosACero ?? #USAvMEX #BeatMexico

timelineItems.name: drew ostler
timelineItems.text: Mexico just got wondo'd. What a poacher. I love his grit. Hard to not see him in 30 man roster, if not 23. #USAvMEX #goonies

timelineItems.name: Dean Leong
timelineItems.text: There's a Jurgen Klinsmann chant going on right now. @J_Klinsmann deserves all the credit right for turning this team around #USMNT #USA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Mexico. Conceded by Tony Beltran.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bils
timelineItems.text: As much as I don't think Wondo will hold up in Brazil, it's impossible not to root for the man to sneak his way on the plane. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Luis Platero
timelineItems.text: This is a different #USMNT I could see some potential now�

timelineItems.name: Jeffrey Diaz
timelineItems.text: Can't keep attacking down the same flank. Too predictable. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Este es el gol de Michael Bradley que abrió el marcador al minuto 15- #USAvMEX http://t.co/b7ParPN3XO

timelineItems.name: Rachel Spangenthal
timelineItems.text: I can hear my dad yelling, "Play the wings fellas!" #USMNT #coachsdaughter

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: [GIF] Make it two: http://t.co/3njGG8mkAB #USAvMEX http://t.co/49KnVOw1kc

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: [GIF] Make it two: http://t.co/3njGG8mkAB #USAvMEX http://t.co/49KnVOw1kc

timelineItems.name: Lance
timelineItems.text: Might be in the minority but I really like the new men's kit. #USMNT #BombPops

timelineItems.name: Shane Forbes
timelineItems.text: All Mexico is doing is chasing the ball and pouncing on the occ US mistake. The US is completely dictating play. Amazing. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Isaac Brizuela (Mexico) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Kyle Beckerman (USA).

timelineItems.name: Dalé
timelineItems.text:
Great start #USMNT 2-0! ��⚽️
#USAvMEX | #USA
#soccer | #dosacero

timelineItems.name: Justin Davis (59-16)
timelineItems.text: Anyone think #USAvMEX rivalry is getting to where #USA is considered "Big Brother"?

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Clint Dempsey (USA).
Carlos Peña (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matt Hodges
timelineItems.text: #USMNT looking really solid. Good tempo, good possession, playing with purpose. Nice to have people vying for a trip to Brazil.

timelineItems.name: Marko Ilich
timelineItems.text: Since the draw I said I would put money on the #USMNT coming out of the group stage over Portugal. Ghana is a variable.

timelineItems.name: Ashley Ferguson
timelineItems.text: Dempsey can show up anytime now. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Alexander Abnos
timelineItems.text: I tried making a Tweetdeck column for #USAvMEX and it damn near crashed my computer.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Graham Zusi (USA).
Rafael Márquez (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: David Coonin
timelineItems.text: #Bradley and #USMNT looking sharp #DosACero. Bradley key to USA success. Must stay healthy.

timelineItems.name: Sonny Powell
timelineItems.text: Got to stay focused these last few minutes before half. Play strong and keep the 2-0 lead #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: jake grabowsky
timelineItems.text: The movement and passing in the midfield is so much better tonight than usual #michaelbradley #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Pauly Kwestel
timelineItems.text: I cannot for the life of me believe that Jozy Altidore... still... somehow is written in cement as the #USMNT no 1 striker. Mind boggling

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Carlos Peña (Mexico).
Clint Dempsey (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Julian Cardillo
timelineItems.text: #USMNT first half: Some little mistakes that could be punished in Brazil, but otherwise dominating. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.text: Julian Green in 15 minutes. You heard it from the man @J_Klinsmann himself. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Derek Banyard, MD
timelineItems.text: In Jurgen we trust. #USAvMEX #USMNT #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Marty Carlson
timelineItems.text: Julian Green to get roughly 30 minutes tonight with the first team! #exciting #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Emi Giles
timelineItems.text: Klinsmann says if things go well, Julian Greene will be making his debut for the #USMNT in 15 min! Can't wait to see him in action! #fb

timelineItems.text: Does this camera seem way higher and zoomed out than normal? #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: 91Jayhawk
timelineItems.text: Well, that was ugly. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Andrew Moebius
timelineItems.text: That's what happens when you don't pick up people in the box #USMNT

timelineItems.name: @Buffalo_Tony
timelineItems.text: Well no more #DosACero. Let's finish this #USMNT #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Weston David Pagano
timelineItems.text: Can't really blame the #USMNT defense there, I didn't know Rafa Marquez still existed either. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Footie
timelineItems.text: Mexico picked up the pace let's see how our guys handle it #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: That one is on Omar Gonzalez. I think Besler-Omar is set in stone at this point, but Gonzalez is still making those mistakes. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS

timelineItems.name: Ale
timelineItems.text: So Mexico finally woke up and decided to play some soccer #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Rogelio Chávez (Mexico).

timelineItems.name: Rocket 1124
timelineItems.text: Going to hate myself in 6 hours but having fun watching #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Hook
timelineItems.text: For some reason the #USMNT never seems to step on #Mexico's throat. We get up 2-0 and take our foot off the gas. Every time.

timelineItems.comment: Isaac Brizuela (Mexico) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Kyle Beckerman (USA).

timelineItems.name: Bruce Englehardt
timelineItems.text: Julian Green and LD are coming in. Getting final instructions from Hertzog. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Bob Hayes
timelineItems.text: Keep in mind the squad has more or less been playing together for years, while Green has had two days. Don't expect too much here. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: CAMBIO (57') | Ingresa Luis Montes por Isaac Brizuela en México. #USAvMEX 2-1

timelineItems.name: AmericanSoccerJunkie
timelineItems.text: Oh good, #USMNT concedes another set piece in a dangerous position. Giving them away like candy on Halloween right now. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Michael Nalepka
timelineItems.text: Yes! Julian Green is finally making his debut! About to show everyone how good he is and how bright of a fruit we have. #USMNT #number9

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Welcome to the #USMNT, Julian: http://t.co/6F51kzE6HP #USAvMEX http://t.co/rxOivoQAW5

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Welcome to the #USMNT, Julian: http://t.co/6F51kzE6HP #USAvMEX http://t.co/rxOivoQAW5

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 1 - Julian Green has now earned his first @ussoccer cap. Stripes. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Stin
timelineItems.text: The big guns are coming on #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Scott FitzSimmonds
timelineItems.text: Here we go. What we’ve all been waiting for. #USMNT #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: CAMBIO (59') | Hace su debut con la selección estadounidense Julian Green, quien reemplaza a Brad Davis. #USAvMEX 2-1

timelineItems.name: Gavin Booker
timelineItems.text: Staying up for #USAvMEX? Worth it.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: CAMBIOS (59') | Ingresan Landon Donovan y Clarence Goodson, quienes reemplazan a Graham Zusi y Matt Besler, respectivamente. #USAvMEX 2-1

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Raúl Jiménez (Mexico) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Juan Carlos Medina.
Corner,  Mexico. Conceded by Tony Beltran.

timelineItems.name: Logan Price
timelineItems.text: I coach 18 year olds and this kid is playing on the US Men's National Team at 18. I can't comprehend that. Big moment for him. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Mexico. Conceded by Michael Bradley.

timelineItems.name: Andrea Canales
timelineItems.text: Rimando with a save - Mexico has chin up and is attacking with fervor - the possession stat will be different in the second half. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  USA. Conceded by Rafael Márquez.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Carrera
timelineItems.text: Can someone go grab 1st half #USMNT from the locker room please, at your earliest convenience?

timelineItems.name: Gray Gupton
timelineItems.text: The momentum in the #USAvMEX game is defiantly shifted in the Mexican direction. They are threatening to score at anytime.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bentley
timelineItems.text: Is it me or did the rest of you forget Clint Dempsey was playing in this game? #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Michael Bradley (USA) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Tony Beltran.

timelineItems.name: Andrea Canales
timelineItems.text: Green getting a few more touches on the ball, but Mexico not giving US players much space - contesting every ball. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: lania_gm
timelineItems.text: #Breakaleg #elbaby #Repost from @ussoccer with @repostapp --- Green makes his debut for the #USMNT, entering the game with Landon Donovan. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Nick Chávez
timelineItems.text: First time we have Bradley, Dempsey and Donovan on the field together since almost 2 years, along with this Bayern Munich youngster. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Beltran (USA).
Miguel Layún (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Paul Aguilar (Mexico) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Luis Montes with a cross.

timelineItems.name: T P
timelineItems.text: Michael Bradley is so much better than anyone else on the pitch. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Timothy Bowen
timelineItems.text: A tale of two halves. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Fabián (Mexico) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Alan Pulido.

timelineItems.name: Claude Rogers III
timelineItems.text: Well this game went from awesome to pathetic. #USAvMEX typical USA. Can we please keep a lead without giving up goals. #frustrated #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Joel Hoover
timelineItems.text: This camera angle makes the #USMNT look like a bunch of fire ants buzzing around. Can see more of the game, but it's kind of awkward.

timelineItems.name: Dunny Drinking Game
timelineItems.text: Really impressed by #USMNT ball movement. Very crisp passing.

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: This definitely will not be the starting defensive unit in Brazil. Or else it'll just be embarrassing for #USMNT.

timelineItems.name: sdjenn10
timelineItems.text: Time for Yedlin! #USAvMEX @SoundersFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, USA. Tony Beltran tries a through ball, but Eddie Johnson is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: jesus dircio
timelineItems.text: meanwhile the #USMNT is nowhere to be found...

timelineItems.name: Matthew Shumaker
timelineItems.text: #USMNT needs a momentum swing. Feed the ball to Julian Green.

timelineItems.text: #USAvMEX okay - more subs - not sure how this ends now - the shape and players are simply not the same now - need leadership from donovan

timelineItems.text: That was the second good thing dempsey has done tonight. #USMNT

timelineItems.text: What a great game we are witnessing. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Vanessa A. Foxx
timelineItems.text: Finishing. We need finishing. #USAvMEX #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Arthur DeCamp
timelineItems.text: Eddie is not helping himself #leadfeet #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Jim Crawford
timelineItems.text: I'd be interested to see viewership demographics for the #USAvMEX game vs MLB games this evening. Up and coming vs trying to stay relevant.

timelineItems.name: Shane Dale
timelineItems.text: No real scoring chances yet; possession about even. Mexico defended a USA cross well. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Judah Friedlander
timelineItems.text: Klinsman should put himself in the game. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.name: Ravi Cattry
timelineItems.text: Good thing that wasn't a goal. Green would never have lived that down. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Mexico. Conceded by Maurice Edu.
Attempt missed. Alan Pulido (Mexico) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Marco Fabián with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Nyghtewynd
timelineItems.text: Julian Green is a great get, but I can't imagine that he can be put on the final WC roster. He isn't at this level yet. No crime. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Shane Dale
timelineItems.text: At this point, the #USMNT will be fortunate to come away with a draw, which was pretty unimaginable at halftime. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (USA).
Marco Fabián (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Maurice Edu (USA).
Miguel Ponce (Mexico) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: esoterikosInLA
timelineItems.text: #klinsmann was right. #LandonDonovan looks very very very sluggish. He's missing a step...or 3. #USMNT #USAvMEX #USASOCCER

timelineItems.name: Faulk.
timelineItems.text: Its 1am. Im watching this game. #USMNT should do me a solid and win.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, USA. Clint Dempsey tries a through ball, but Eddie Johnson is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: YankeeYiddos
timelineItems.text: Klinsmann can't be happy with the way Donovan and Dempsey have failed to step up. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Miguel Ponce (Mexico) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Alan Pulido.
Attempt saved. Miguel Ponce (Mexico) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Corner,  Mexico. Conceded by Nick Rimando.

timelineItems.name: HTWD Sports
timelineItems.text: EDDIE JOHNSON! NOOO, OFFSIDE! Wow. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Fuera de lugar (85') | Eddie Johnson envía la pelota al fondo de la red, pero se encontraba adelantado. #USAvMEX 2-2

Landon Donovan (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Tristian Rocha
timelineItems.text: Should be up 3-2, but these refs played a late April Fool's joke on the US. #USAvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Alan Pulido (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Julian Green (USA).
Attempt saved. Luis Montes (Mexico) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marco Fabián.

timelineItems.name: J Felt
timelineItems.text: Julian Green starting to shake off the nerves a bit. You can see the skill. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Luis Montes (Mexico) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Alan Pulido.
Foul by Juan Carlos Medina (Mexico).
Landon Donovan (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Clint Dempsey (USA) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left from a direct free kick.
Second Half ends, USA 2, Mexico 2.

timelineItems.text: Summary of this game: US played to win the first half. US played not to lose the second half #USAvMEX #USMNT
